channel.title: Find bitmap or color in a certain square?
channel.description: ok, im making a script, and it needs to search for either a certain color, or bitmap ( i think im gonna use color) in a certain square, how can i do this, i need to do it for over 80 different squares on the screen :? so what is the fastestes, and easiest way to code this, all it needs to do is find set color in a certain square in specified pixels, what is the easiest way to do so? thanks for your help :)

item.source: Find bitmap or color in a certain square?

item.title: Find bitmap or color in a certain square?
item.dc:creator: @bullzeye95 bullzeye
item.description:
@bullzeye95 wrote:

Ok you need to use the command FindColor

First you put in the color. So, FindColor(12345678);
Then after that, you put the Coordinates of the bottom left of the box. So, FindColor(12345678,0,0);
Then the Coordinates of the top right of the box. So, FindColor(12345678,0,0,1000,1000);

IF that was what you were acting. Though you probably already know that.

Read full topic
